actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to prohibit certain franked mailings by Members of the Congress during certain periods before elections.

summary.text: Extends to 120 days the period before any general election involving a Member or Member-elect to Congress within which such Member or Member-elect is prohibited from sending mass mailings as franked mail.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to prohibit certain franked mailings by Members of the Congress during certain periods before elections.
